謘字的基本解释

謘
chí
说话迟钝。

謘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chí］
［《廣韻》直尼切，平脂，澄。］
［《廣韻》直利切，去至，澄。］
言语迟钝。

謘字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　謘； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1175第18
【廣韻】直尼切【集韻】?尼切，?音墀。【說文】語諄謘也。【荀子·樂論篇】衆積謘謘乎。　又人名。希謘，見【宋史·宗室表】。　又【唐韻】直离切【正韻】?知切，?音馳。又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?直利切，墀去聲。又【正韻】直意切，持去聲。義?同。　又【集韻】徒回切，音頹。啍謘，語不正也。

考證：〔【說文】語諄諄也。〕　謹照原文改語諄謘也。
謘字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
謘字的起名意思

暂无。

謘
chí
Speak slowly.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chí］
["Guangyun" Zhiniqie, flat fat, clear. ]
["Guangyun" is straightforward and sharp, go to, and clear. ]
Slow speech.
謘
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　謘; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1175 Page 18
[Guang Yun] Zhi Niche [Ji Yun] Niche, sound Chi. 【Speaking text】Spoken language. 【Xunzi·Lessons】The accumulation of many people.　Another name. Xi Jian, see [Song History·Clan List].　[Tang Yun] Straight away from the cut [Zheng Yun]? Know cut,? Yinchi. And [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Straightforwardly cut, and go to the sound. [Zheng Yun] Straightforwardly cut, holding on to the sound. Righteous? Same.　[Jiyun] again, cut back, sound distressed. Hey, the language is not correct. Textual research: [[Speaking] The language is very good. 〕　I would like to change the language according to the original text.
